Text: Thanks for sharing this.  I'm not big on downloading unknown artists (out of the mainstream) and generally speaking I go out of my way to avoid torrents that mention Canada, however, due to your quality torrents and the fact that the coverart is reminiscent of "The Motels" I snagged this. I was pleasantly surprised.  Thank-you.
Thanks for the kind words.  It is nice to hear that my efforts are appreciated.

Love is a Place...

Thanks politux...
